snippet: The James Bond star Daniel Craig lamented as "unfortunate" but necessary a product placement deal that would see Agent 007 drink a Heineken in his next film adventure.
abstract: The James Bond star Daniel Craig lamented as "unfortunate" but necessary a product placement deal that would see Agent 007 drink a Heineken in his next film adventure.

headline.main: Not Shaken, Not Stirred: James Bond Drinks Beer
headline.print_headline: Brewed, Neither Shaken Nor Stirred: James Bond Learns to Drink Beer
